title: One focused week
text: A proven 7‑day cadence. We ship the highest‑impact pages first.

title: Senior‑only team
text: Work directly with the people doing the work — no handoffs, no drag.

title: Conversion‑first
text: Messaging and patterns tuned to drive demos, signups, and sales.

title: Fast by default
text: Next.js on Vercel with accessibility and performance built in.

title: Transparent pricing
text: Fixed scope for the week and simple options to continue — no surprises.

title: Partner mindset
text: We stay post‑launch to test, learn, and keep momentum.
